name: Ref. Case Com. ASHP (FS) CC
_description: Typical size light commercial rooftop HP unit with reference case performance (counterfactual), cold-climate

market_entry_year_source.notes: Assume historical measure penetration is captured in baseline

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Typical efficiency in 2023 (use 2023 new standard value of 3.4 instead of 2020 value of 3.3)

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

installed_cost_source.notes: Median typical installed cost in 2020 divided by typical capacity (90 kBtu/h cooling)

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2012 - Table B30 -  Cooling energy sources, number of buildings and floorspace
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Heating fraction excludes electric heating and non-electric heating in floorspace where cooling is served by a chiller or district chilled water (21,649 sf out of 79294 sf cooled), under the assumption that this service is not replacable by the targeted heat pump; cooling fraction excludes cooling in buildings that use electric source of primary heating (25,613 sf/ 79,294 sf).
